text: Arturo Fernández Rodríguez (21 February 1929 – 4 July 2019) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in many stage performances and movies from 1954 until his retirement in April 2019. He was born in Gijón, Asturias, Spain. His best known works include Red Cross Girls, College Boarding House and The Locket. ==Death== Fernández Rodríguez underwent stomach surgery in April 2019. He recovered from the surgery, but shortly afterwards suffered a fall.Muere Arturo Fernández a los 90 años His health never recovered and he died on 4 July 2019 at a hospital in Madrid from problems caused by the fall at the age of 90.Muere Arturo Fernández, galán eterno del teatro, a los 90 años ==Movies== * Judas' Kiss (1954) * Las Chicas de la Cruz Roja (1958) *College Boarding House (1959) * Rogelia (1962) * Currito of the Cross (1965) * Road to Rocío (1966) * Cristina Guzmán (1968) * The Locket (1970) * The Complete Idiot (1970) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors
title: Arturo Fernández Rodríguez
